entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 5:16 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
